mapper.select: select groupCode, groupName from uppergroup where siteCode = #{siteCode}

select companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, equipments.eqCode, eqcatalog.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join eqcatalog on equipments.eqCode = eqcatalog.eqCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode where equipments.siteCode = #{siteCode} and equipments.groupCode = #{groupCode}

mapper.update: update uppergroup set groupName = #{groupName} where groupCode = #{groupCode}
